name: 林家薇
objective: 本課程將帶領學生學習英文文法、型態、及段落的基本技巧。學生在本課程中需要寫出多種英文句型正確的語句及多種類型的段落。學生可以運用這些技巧而獨立寫出任何主題的英文文章。
schedule:
Week 1 Present and Past
Week 2 Present Perfect and Past
Week 3 Future
Week 4 Modals
Week 5 If and wish
Week 6 Passive
Week 7 Reported Speech
Week 8 Questions and Auxiliary Verbs
Week 9 Midterm
Week 10 -ing and the Infinitive
Week 11 Articles and Nouns
Week 12 Pronouns and Determiners
Week 13 Relative Clauses
Week 14 Adjectives and Adverbs
Week 15 Conjunctions and Prepositions
Week 16 Prepositions
Week 17 Phrasal Verbs
Week 18 Final
scorePolicy:
Schoolwide Midterm 20%
Textbook Midterm 20%
Textbook Final 20%
In-class practice  40%
